name: Infernal Ascent
description:
Hold and release the button to launch. Hit the circles for a bigger boost! Use A&D to aim yourself!

So originally when we started this jam, we had 4 people. After it started it cut in half to two, a programmer and a sound designer.

Overall, this thing needs a LOT of tweaking. But I learned a lot over the last week, and with some more polish and LOTS of playtesting, I think this could be a fun one eventually.
